author: Nicole Wetsman
title: A video uses lasers to show how you spit when you talk
description: The video shows that you produce particles just by talking, but it misses the tiniest ones. That could make it misleading because tiny particles often escape masks and could still spread disease like COVID-19.
content:
It only catches big particles, though
Photo by Justin Setterfield/Getty Images
